comment: I can't believe some people said this professor was amazing. She is such a terrible teacher and doesn't know anything about management. It's an easy A class but you don't wanna waste your money and time taking this class
To be honest you teach yourself by reading the text book. She cancelled so many classes and those that she taught were sometimes 15 minutes long. The online modules are a headache.

OMG! Take her...She is an AMAZING professor, wants you to enjoy class, you will learn ALOT from her. Test are very straight forward, right out of the book and powerpoints, Attendance is not Mandatory but she will  take it once in a while and it counts towards your participation grade. Very nice lady. I wish she taught more classes. Take her Take he
One of the best professors ever, she is extremely helpful and extremely fair!! If you don't do well in her class it's your own fault!

This class/professor was useless. I took it during summer 2009, she couldn't get webct to work so she had to drop about 100 points out of our total point spread.  She doesn't teach anything, just reads from the power point slides.  I learned nothing yet earned an 'A'.

Greatest teacher ever! Cancelled class for 2 weeks for no reason. Showed us the test and answers to review. All she does is read the powerpoints. 2 tests, 2 case studies and a group project. Let us even grade our own tests. Replaces the final with best test grade. If she was teaching more classes i would totally take her again! Best teacher at KSU!
